block.p: American League DETROIT TIGERS -- Placed 1B Hal Morris on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled 1B-OF Dusty Allen from Toledo of the International League.

National League ATLANTA BRAVES -- Named Dayton Moore director of international scouting. CINCINNATI REDS -- Announced OF Brooks Kieschnick cleared waivers and accepted an assignment to Louisville of the International League. SAN FRANCISCO GIANTS -- Signed LHP Kirk Rueter to three-year contract.
American League DETROIT TIGERS -- Placed 1B Hal Morris on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled 1B-OF Dusty Allen from Toledo of the International League.

National League ATLANTA BRAVES -- Named Dayton Moore director of international scouting. CINCINNATI REDS -- Announced OF Brooks Kieschnick cleared waivers and accepted an assignment to Louisville of the International League. SAN FRANCISCO GIANTS -- Signed LHP Kirk Rueter to three-year contract.
HARLEM GLOBETROTTERS -- Announced the resignation of Chad Groth, manager of basketball operations and director of scouting.

National Basketball Association NBA -- Named Larry Weitzman vice president-multimedia production and programming. INDIANA PACERS -- Re-signed G Reggie Miller. LOS ANGELES LAKERS -- Signed F Nate Johnson.
Women's National Basketball Association DETROIT SHOCK -- Activated G Tamicha Jackson from the injured list. Placed F Oksana Zakaluzhnaya on the injured list.

National Football League DALLAS COWBOYS -- Claimed TE Chris Smith off waivers. GREEN BAY PACKERS -- Traded WR Robert Scott to the Denver Broncos for an undisclosed future draft pick. WASHINGTON REDSKINS -- Signed K Clay Rush.

National Hockey League CALGARY FLAMES -- Announced the retirement of Lanny McDonald, vice president of corporate development. Named Brad McCrimmon assistant coach. CAROLINA HURRICANES -- Sign G Tyler Moss. FLORIDA PANTHERS -- Re-signed LW Ray Whitney re-signed to a three-year contract. PHOENIX COYOTES -- Signed LW Philippe Audet and D Dan Focht to one-year contracts.
Major League Soccer MLS -- Fined Tampa Bay coach Tim Hankinson $2,000 for public criticism of the referees after an Aug. 2 game against Chicago. Signed D Miroslaw Rzepa and assigned him to Columbus.

ARMY -- Named Carmine Giglio assistant gymnastics coach. Named Fritz Hamburg assistant baseball coach. BROWN -- Named Scott Nelson men's lacrosse coach. NOTRE DAME -- Named Sean Kearney men's associate basketball coach, Anthony Solomon and Lewis Preston men's assistant basketball coaches and Rod Balanis director of basketball operations. OREGON STATE -- Suspended sophomore WR Alton Adams, freshman WR James Newsom and senior WR Robert Prescott for the first three games of the 2000 football season for their role in an off-campus fight. PENNSYLVANIA -- Named James Cook men's assistant men's track and field and cross country coach, Lisa Fells and Jennifer Moyer trainers, Meg Kinney compliance assistant, Chris Rogers athletic operations and facilities assistant and Jared Shank athletic communications assistant. SETON HALL -- Named Kelly Smith women's assistant soccer coach. STONY BROOK -- Named Megan Bryant softball coach and Joe Viadella offensive coordinator. URSINUS -- Named Bill Stiles assistant athletic director and Brian Thomas associate athletic director. WASHINGTON STATE -- Named Tim Mooney baseball coach. YALE -- Named Christi Ireland assistant cross country and track and field coach.
